name: example
license: See the license is in the LICENSE.md file.

scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run transpile:full && npm run bundle && npm run build:babel && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:dev:update: npm run transpile:update && npm run bundle && npm run build:babel && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run transpile:full && npm run bundle && npm run build:babel && npm run build:dist && npm run min && npm run gzip
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:output
